QuestData.Title: I'll Do It By Hand
QuestData.Description: Yes, this all looks familiar enough.$b$bThanks to all the information you gathered for me, I'm sure that I can activate the mechanism. I'll just need some time free from distraction.$b$bAs soon as I get started, you can count on that titan construct to try and stop me.$b$bThat's where you come in.$b$bI don't need to remind you of what's riding on this. Take down that guardian!
